entry.title: ₿uilder 1
entry.content:
Intro (10 min)

  • Chatham House Rules — No photos/videos
  • This is our first ₿uilder! We’re very open to feedback and ideas on how to make these events great. Feel free to suggest ideas during the meetup or afterwards
  • Define ₿uilder and purpose for starting this event series
  • Anyone can be a ₿uilder! Vibe coding makes building apps approachable and intuitive
  • Quick Show of Hands
    • Who works for big tech? PM? Designer? Other?
    • Who has vibe coded before? Integrated bitcoin?
  • 10 Second Intros
    • Name
    • What you do
    • What you want to get out of ₿uilder

Vibe-Coded App Showcase

  • Anyone?

Startup Showcase

  • Agicash

Bitcoin Products (20 min)

  • Block rolls out Bitcoin payments on Square at the Bitcoin 2025 Conference in Las Vegas
    • Steak N Shake reports 50% savings on processing fees when using BTC
  • Square is earning 9.7% returns on its C= Lighting Service Provider
    • Bitrefill reports 3.5% returns
    • Amboss launches Rails, a self-custody Bitcoin yield service
  • Coinbase Credit Card preannouncement. 2%–4% back in BTC depending on assets held
  • Start9 moves Knots to the Main Registry Previously in the Community Registry
    • Knots at 13% market share
  • Home equity → bitcoin: Horizon and Sovana
  • Lightning Wallet Market in Japan 64%: Wallet of Satoshi
  • Foundation will release Passport Prime in Q3
  • COLDCARD Co-Sign (CCC)
  • Bitkey introduces Security Hub
  • Ledger sunsets Nano S
  • Xverse integrates Lightning via Sati
  • Wallet of Satoshi non-custodial wallet available again in the US
  • Blitz: first Spark mobile wallet
  • Magic Eden partners with Spark for faster and cheaper BTC settlements
  • Cake wallet adds Payjoin v2

Regulatory (4 min)

  • Federal Housing Director orders Fannie Mae to consider Crypto as an asset for obtaining mortgages
  • Clarity Act heads to House floor for Vote
    • BRCA included in market structure bill, the Clarity Act
    • Save our Wallets

Bitcoin Design (30 min)

  • ₿-only convention for displaying bitcoin quantities
    • BIP-177 describes a new approach to bitcoin units that deprecates both the use of decimals and the usage of “sats/satoshis”
    • New page added to Design guide with proposed best practices
    • Boardwalk Cash is an example of a product leading and embracing the change
  • Seedless is safer debate

Discussions (40 min)

  • The emergence of vibecoding
  • TradFi payments vs. stablecoins vs. bitcoin: Where does bitcoin separate itself?
  • Mixing digital and physical: Integrating vibe-coded apps with billboards

Miscellaneous (1 min)

  • Presidio Bitcoin Quantum Summit: Applications Open
  • Presidio Bitcoin Design Week in September (more info coming soon)
  • Miami ₿uilder — and hopes for more around the world!

Wrapping Up (5 min)

  • What went well?
  • Areas of improvement for future meetups
